items.content_html: This repository simulates how DINOv3-like AI models process images and compares their activations with human brain responses. It demonstrates early vs deep layer processing, computes similarity using cosine metrics, and visualizes hierarchical alignment, providing a simplified computational insight into how AI mirrors human visual perception.
items.title: Akhilesh2004NSBW/DINOv3-Models: This repository simulates how DINOv3-like AI models process images and compares their activations with human brain responses. It demonstrates early vs deep layer processing, computes similarity using cosine metrics, and visualizes hierarchical alignment, providing a simplified computational insight into how AI mirrors human visual perception.
